subject: Lockouts
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Donald Fehr, the leader of the N.H.L. Players’ Association, seems unfazed by rising criticism from fans over the lockout, even after owners flatly rejected the union’s offer to settle last week.
snippet: Donald Fehr, the leader of the N.H.L. Players’ Association, seems unfazed by rising criticism from fans over the lockout, even after owners flatly rejected the union’s offer to settle last week.
